The reason your abuela was “legal” was likely bc there was effectively no “illegal” US immigration when she came, except for the Chinese.

Who came here legally
She didn't sneak on a boat
Her parents bought tickets 
& obeyed the law

Illegal https://twitter.com/AOC/status/1144722846062698496

The history of Citizenship in the US is deeply woven with the history of racism. It has been used as the legal enforcer of racism for most of US history.

Citizenship affords power, & that’s why citizenship of African Americans was long denied too - to both slaves & descendants.

My skeptics often accuse me of being boring, of hammering the same themes. They’re probably right. It's never made sense to me that a few people have incredible wealth and power while most have none.

Should we ever achieve justice, I promise I’ll write some new speeches.
